title: Topic 001 Question 306
body: A company runs a workload on an Amazon EC2 instance. The workload needs a temporary cache that contains data that changes frequently. The workload does not need to retain the cache across instance restarts.
Which storage option will provide the HIGHEST performance for the cache?
options: General Purpose SSD (gp3) Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume
Provisioned IOPS SSD (io2) Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume
Throughput Optimized HDD (st1) Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume
